Measure Once, Cut Twice

Really liked John Gruber’s crafting analogy some time back about sensible and appropriate caution before action “Daring Fireball: Measure Twice, Cut Once”. Slightly saddened and concerned for the future about the reports online about battery performance getting worse from iOS 5.0.1. I hope 5.0.2 isn’t too quick getting released.

2011-11-18
Could do better Early Adopter Pain
